title: What is the best, most well done cover of a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's one of the greatest:  Gov't Mule with Grace Potter covering Gold Dust Woman by Fleetwood Mac live at Mountain Jam 2010 is one of the best covers of an already great song. They really capture the essence of the song and bring it to the next level. And Grace’s vocals are off the charts! I'm so glad I stumbled across this on YouTube. Edit: here's another great one. Not sure it's the best ever. But I think it's awesome. Here are Alicia Keyes and John Mayer covering each other's songs together; If I Ain't Got You and Gravity:

One of my favorites is the 1956 Elvis Presley tune “Paralyzed” done by Dave Edmunds and his band in a 1987 tribute to Elvis and released on his I Hear You Rockin’ album,  Also, Dave and Nick Lowe could cover Everly Brothers songs like no one else. Here’s “Problems”, “Crying In The Rain”,”Poor Jenny” “When Will I Be Loved” all done live on a radio show in 1979 .  And another cover of an Everly Brothers hit”Take A Message To Mary”
